title: What do you say after a match?
body: I've always wondered what people say after matches such as when nexus is about to explode. I've normally seen "ggez" and that annoys me but i always say "ggwp all" even if it was a terrible game now i ask... What do you say after a match and what do you see a lot after a match

replies.body:
Normally I say GG or GG WP

I too hate people that say gg ez in anyway. Just feels disrespectful.
You are legit the only comment as of now not talking about disrespecting the enemy team in any form. This makes me wonder the difference in ordinary gamers and Riot gamers...

Or it shows the difference between people on boards and people who are employed to set a good example.

Honestly most of the people on boards are #*$%&!@ (Self censoring here cause i got banned for saying it last time)

I think you got this the wrong way around man. Riot doesn't employ people to set a good example. 

Riot employs people that are already of good character =P (of course thats not the only thing they look for though)

I have been like this since way back in my Dota days.
Or maybe the people here are being sarcastic
I usually say gg or ggwp unless the game felt throwey in which case I say nothing. On the other hand if its really close then i say vgg or coment on the greatness of the experience.

It depends. If I found it to be a good game, or feel the other team is worthy of some respect for their attitudes, I'll say "gg" (and yes that does occur more often when I win, it's only natural that winning makes a person feel better than losing). Similarly with "wp" I'll say it if I feel most of the people played well or if the other team is worthy of respect for the way they played (and they didn't ruin the game with their attitude). There are times when I wont say anything though, because I know I'd probably get reported if I did say something. I rarely say more.
If I win, I say "gg" since I'm too lazy to say anything else. But if I lose, Most of the time I say " We let you guys win". If I want to trash talk I simply say "I didn't know I was playing bots."

i fucked your mum

then you leave in post-game lobby straight away

you sure showed them
GG get rekt no re play bots m8

gg
gg ez if they've been trash talking or it was a complete stomp
